mapper.select: SELECT b.*,t.`name` tag_name FROM t_blog b LEFT JOIN t_blog_tags bt ON b.`id` = bt.`blogs_id` INNER JOIN t_tag t ON bt.`tags_id` = t.`id` WHERE b.`id` = #{bid} LIMIT 1

SELECT b.`id` AS bid, b.`title`, b.`description`, b.`first_picture`, b.`content`, b.`flag`, b.`published`, b.`appreciation`, b.`commentabled`, b.`recommend`, b.`share_statement`, b.`views`, b.`type_id`, b.`user_id`, b.`comment_count`, b.`is_delete`, b.`create_time`, b.`update_time`, u.`id` AS uid, u.`username`, u.`nickname`, u.`avatar`, u.`email`, u.`description`, ty.`name` AS type_name FROM t_blog b LEFT JOIN t_user u ON b.`user_id` = u.`id` LEFT JOIN t_type ty ON b.`type_id` = ty.`id` WHERE b.`id` = #{bid}
SELECT t.`name` AS `name`, COUNT(blog.`id`) AS `value` FROM t_blog AS blog LEFT JOIN t_type AS t ON t.`id` = blog.`type_id` GROUP BY t.`name`
